title: Kyle Weeks Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Kyle Weeks? Check out all of Kyle Weeks's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogKyle Weeks Senior Product Marketing Manager, Similarweb Kyle Weeks Kyle is a product and growth marketer with experience spanning from product marketing at Apple to building startups of various sizes. At Similarweb, he’s focused on helping SEOs and other keyword-focused professionals leverage the platform to reliably grow their traffic. Outside of marketing, he’s passionate about food & wine, graduating from culinary school in NYC and also becoming a Certified Sommelier.
